scenario_name: Nimbus Cloud Solutions – Enterprise SaaS Monthly Business Review (MBR) – Product & Engineering
workback_prompt:
Generate a detailed workback plan for the 'Nimbus Cloud Solutions – Enterprise SaaS Monthly Business Review (MBR) – Product & Engineering' scenario. The plan should start from T‑30 (30 days before the meeting on 5 December 2025) and outline all tasks, owners, durations, dependencies, and required data sources needed to produce the deliverables listed. Include milestones for data extraction, deck creation, stakeholder reviews, budget approval steps, and contingency actions for the identified constraints. Format the output as a table or Gantt‑style list suitable for project tracking.

Generate a LOW QUALITY workback plan with these characteristics:
- Missing key tasks or phases
- Vague task descriptions
- Few or no dependencies defined
- Missing stakeholder assignments
- No milestones or poorly defined milestones
- Unrealistic timelines
- No risk consideration
- Minimal deliverables identified

IMPORTANT: Generate a plan that naturally exhibits LOW quality characteristics.
Do not explicitly label the plan as "low quality" - let the quality emerge from the content.
analysis:
**Nimbus Cloud Solutions – Enterprise SaaS Monthly Business Review (MBR) – Product & Engineering**  
*Work‑back plan – starting T‑30 (30 days before the meeting on 5 Dec 2025)*  

| Day (relative to meeting) | Task / Milestone | Owner (if known) | Duration (days) | Dependencies | Required Data / Sources |
|---------------------------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|--------------|--------------------------|
| -30 | “Start” (kick‑off) | – | 1 | – | – |
| -29 | Pull some data | Analyst | 2 | “Start” | Sales numbers, usage logs |
| -27 | Prepare deck (rough) | PM | 5 | Pull some data | Data extracts, previous decks |
| -22 | Review deck internally | Team lead | 1 | Prepare deck (rough) | Draft deck |
| -21 | Update deck (quick fix) | PM | 2 | Review deck internally | Feedback notes |
| -19 | Get budget numbers | Finance | 1 | – | Budget spreadsheet |
| -18 | Add budget slide | PM | 1 | Get budget numbers | Budget numbers |
| -17 | Send deck to stakeholder | – | 1 | Add budget slide | Draft deck |
| -16 | Stakeholder review (quick) | Exec | 1 | Send deck to stakeholder | Deck |
| -15 | Minor edits | PM | 1 | Stakeholder review (quick) | Comments |
| -14 | Finalize deck | PM | 1 | Minor edits | Final deck |
| -13 | Prepare talking points | – | 1 | Finalize deck | Deck |
| -12 | Send final deck to meeting organizer | PM | 1 | Prepare talking points | Final deck |
| -11 | “Milestone: Data extraction complete” | – | – | Pull some data | – |
| -10 | “Milestone: Deck ready” | – | – | Finalize deck | – |
| -9  | Contingency: If data missing, use old numbers | Analyst | 2 | Pull some data | Historical data |
| -7  | Contingency: If budget not approved, skip slide | – | 1 | Get budget numbers | – |
| -6  | Quick rehearsal | PM | 1 | Prepare talking points | Deck |
| -5  | Final check | PM | 1 | Quick rehearsal | Deck |
| -4  | Send reminder to attendees | Organizer | 1 | – | Meeting invite |
| -3  | “Milestone: Stakeholder sign‑off” | Exec | – | Stakeholder review (quick) | – |
| -2  | Last‑minute tweaks | PM | 1 | Final check | Deck |
| -1  | Upload deck to shared drive | PM | 0.5 | Last‑minute tweaks | Final deck |
| 0   | MBR meeting (5 Dec 2025) | All | – | – | Deck, talking points |
